Pong

Game Instructions

Welcome to the game! In this simple table tennis game, players aim to reach 10 points to win. Control the paddles using the keyboard and enjoy some fun gaming with friends!

Player Controls:

  • Player 1:
    • Move paddle up: Use the "w" key
    • Move paddle down: Use the "s" key
  • Player 2:
    • Move paddle up: Use the "Arrow Up" key
    • Move paddle down: Use the "Arrow Down" key

Winning the Game:

The player who reaches 10 points first wins the game. Points are scored when the ball enters the opponent's side.

Enjoy the game and challenge yourself or your friends in the exciting world of table tennis. Good luck and have fun!
